this movie sucks dick
no not literally so put your thing back in your pants
it is a waste of time
the only moment to watch this is if you are really tired of living and on the virge of killing yourself, because after having seen this the whole which appeared so horrible will suddenly smell like roses again
so for everyone who is not getting ready to jump off a cliff or hang by a rope, do yourself a favor and skip this one

ooooo this movie is sooo bad
i'm STILL going around commenting on it, go figure ;)

please stop seeding this crap
it's stench is ruining the fresh air
